biotools.summary: iCOMIC is an open source genomic data analysis tool characterized by a user friendly GUI. It integrates many independent core workflows for Whole Genome/Exome Sequencing and RNA-Seq data analysis along with Machine Learning tools, cTaG and NBDriver for cancer related data analysis.
